text: John Stephen Goodman (born June 20, 1952) is an American actor. He is best known for being on Roseanne, for which he won a Golden Globe Award for Best Actor in 1993. He married Annabeth Herzog in 1989. They have a daughter, Molly Evangeline Goodman (born 1990). ==Filmography== ===Film=== Year Title Role Notes 1983 Fred Television film 1983 Eddie Macon's Run Herbert 1983 Commando 1983 Heart of Steel Raymond Bohupinsky Television film 1984 Revenge of the Nerds Coach Harris 1984 C.H.U.D.
